price: ߊ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߝߐ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߕߘߍ߬ ߡߍ߲ ߠߎ߫ ߓߊ߬ߕߏ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߸ ߏ߬ ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߡߌ߲߫؟
arabic: وَقِيلَ لَهُمۡ أَيۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡبُدُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: waqīla lahum ayna mā kuntum taʿbudūna
